About {{ systemServiceName }}

The {{ systemServiceName }} site is built on the KForge system. KForge provisions common tools on demand.

  • Wikis and mailing lists (e.g. MoinMoin, Mailman).
  • Content management systems and blogs (e.g. Joomla, Wordpress, DAV).
  • Version control systems (e.g. Subversion, Mercurial, Git) with access via SSH and HTTP.
  • A project framework with mechanisms to plan and track work (e.g. Trac).

KForge controls access to services with a robust single sign-on access controller.

Using KForge

The KForge User Guide describes how to complete common tasks.

The KForge Install Guide describes how to setup a KForge site.

If you are interested in KForge, please join the Mailing list.
